statements.select:
select t2.*, t1.PLAN_DATE, t1.SHIFT_ID, t1.EQUIP_ID, t3.SHIFT_NAME, t4.EQUIP_NAME , t6.MATERIAL_NAME, t7.SHOW_NAME PLAN_STATE_CAPTION , t8.SHOW_NAME PLAN_TYPE_CAPTION , to_char(t1.PLAN_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') || ',' || t3.SHIFT_NAME || ',' || t4.EQUIP_NAME || ',' || t6.MATERIAL_NAME PLAN_DETAIL_NAME from HPP_PLAN t1 join HPP_PLAN_DETAIL t2 on t1.OBJID = t2.Plan_Id left join SSB_SHIFT t3 on t1.SHIFT_ID = t3.OBJID left join SBE_EQUIP t4 on t1.EQUIP_ID = t4.OBJID left join SBM_MATERIAL t6 on t2.MATERIAL_ID = t6.OBJID left join HPP_PLAN_STATE t7 on t2.PLAN_STATE = t7.OBJID left join HPP_PLAN_TYPE t8 on t2.PLAN_TYPE = t8.OBJID where t1.DELETE_FLAG = 0 and t2.DELETE_FLAG = 0
t1.PLAN_DATE >= #where.BEGIN_DATE#
t1.PLAN_DATE <= #where.END_DATE#
t1.SHIFT_ID = #where.SHIFT_ID#
t1.EQUIP_ID = #where.EQUIP_ID#
t2.MATERIAL_ID = #where.MATERIAL_ID#
t2.PLAN_STATE = #where.PLAN_STATE#
t2.PLAN_TYPE = #where.PLAN_TYPE#
order by $OrderString$

select OBJID sskey,SHIFT_NAME ssValue from SSB_SHIFT where DELETE_FLAG = '0'
order by $OrderString$
order by OBJID

select OBJID sskey,SHOW_NAME ssValue from HPP_PLAN_STATE where DELETE_FLAG = '0'
order by $OrderString$
order by OBJID

select OBJID sskey,SHOW_NAME ssValue from HPP_PLAN_TYPE where DELETE_FLAG = '0'
order by $OrderString$
order by OBJID
